entry.title: Top Sublime Text 2 Plugins/Themes which I use the most
entry.content:
Here are the list of Sublime text 2 Plugins which I use the most. Check out!!

  • package Control
  • Git
  • Gist
  • Emmet
  • sublime Linter
  • JSForman
  • JSMinifier
  • alignment
  • jquery
  • bracket Highlighter
  • sftp
  • live Reload
  • Ruby On Rails Snippets
  • twitter Bootstrap Snippets

My Favourite Theme:

  • Soda Dark

Please let me know which plugins you use!! And which one you like the most..
